sentences.sContent: I’ve learned as much about teaching from learning about marketing as I have from studying pedagogy – maybe more.
sentences.sContent_eng: I’ve learned as much about teaching from learning about marketing as I have from studying pedagogy – maybe more.
sentences.sCn: 我从销售上学到的有关教育的东西和我研究教育学时候学到的一样多——可能更多。

remMethod.val: ped (儿童) + agog (引导) + y → 儿童教育的主要目的就是引导孩子 → 教育学

words.tran: 教师的（等于pedagogical）；教育学的；教授法的
（小学）教师；喜欢卖弄学问的教师（等于pedagogue）
教育学；教学法；教师职业

trans.tranOther: the practice of teaching or the study of teaching
